title: Would you buy a used gaming PC?
body:
I seriously doubt anyone would, but I have a rig I have put together that maxes any game i have come across at 1080p, and am sure it would handle most 1440p gaming at least on high/ultra with decent FPS.

It has been babied, and the only old parts are the CPU and mobo (which are 3 years old). Everything else has been replaced within the last 6 months, but i would actually like to build a better rig in a higher price bracket.

Of course i would have no need for the old one, but i really don't want to sell it piece by piece.

If you were to buy gaming parts, would it be in pieces? O would you rather buy a whole system?

I am attempting to sell it as a "Preconfigured" system ready to go out of the box(No assembly, all Programs installed, pre OC at stable clocks etc) but have no experience selling my old systems as i usually give them to family and friends. This time i have nobody left to give them to, so might as well sell it.
